headers.subject: Re: [PHP-WIN] Error with Sessions please help
headers.received: from unknown (HELO herman.ssw.cz) (194.212.96.2) by va.php.net with SMTP; 16 Jan 2001 14:50:21 -0000
from pavelk (pavelk.prosek.ssw.cz [194.212.97.131]) by oskar.prosek.ssw.cz with SMTP (Microsoft Exchange Internet Mail Service Version 5.5.2232.9) id CXHTBVQL; Tue, 16 Jan 2001 15:52:01 +0100

body.para: Robert, modify your session.save_path directive in PHP.INI to point to an existing directory, for example c:\winnt\temp

quote.quotefooter: ----- Original Message ----- From: "Robert Trembath" <robert@ishoptech.com> To: "PHP List" <php-windows@lists.php.net> Sent: Tuesday, January 16, 2001 3:37 PM Subject: [PHP-WIN] Error with Sessions please help

quote.quotepara: I have been using PHP4.04 on W2K with little or no problems using php.exe instead of isapi. But when I try to initiate a session with
Warning: open(/tmp\sess_0baf96e5228010461d9116db56bb349b, O_RDWR) failed: m (2) in c:\inetpub\wwwroot\DBTest.php on line 2 Successfully connected to MySQL Successfully selected "Portal"
There are currently 2 users in the database.
User Name User Type Last Login City Robert Trembath Shopper 6/30/2000 1:37:40 PM Houston Robert Trembath Realtor 6/30/2000 9:11:20 AM Houston
Warning: open(/tmp\sess_0baf96e5228010461d9116db56bb349b, O_RDWR) failed: m (2) in Unknown on line 0
Warning: Failed to write session data (files). Please verify that the current setting of session.save_path is correct (/tmp) in Unknown on line 0
